articles.title: Can COVID-19 vaccines get us to herd immunity? 'The jury is definitely still out' - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: The question of how many people must be vaccinated to reach herd immunity against COVID-19 is of crucial importance. Experts say the number is probably higher than previously thought.
articles.content:
The aim of the vaccination campaign against COVID-19 is herd immunity the point at which so few people are susceptible to infection that the virus runs out of places to go.
